1You are currently on page one234200Page 200, the final page

Futons & Daybeds

Short on space or in need of a multifunctional guest bed? Look no further than futons or daybeds. Both of these furniture pieces are designed to fulfill the role of a sofa or a bed in a pinch. Futons have frames that are designed to unfold to create a flat sleeping surface. They also come with flexible mattresses that make the transition from sofa to bed and back to sofa as seamless as possible. On the other hand, daybeds have fixed frames that may or may not come with a removable trundle bed underneath that's double the beds! They're designed to look like a sofa minus the cushioned backrests. You can create the feel of a cushioned sofa with an assortment of stylish throw pillows. The standard daybed size is typically the same as a twin-size bed (38\" x 75\"). However, both futons and daybeds are available in a range of sizes, including twin, full, or queen.
